name: Kireidius
description:
"A cute otaku bunny girl flies on her magic sword through the skies, fighting for all bunny girl fans in the world!"

Made for "A game by its cover 2021" game jam. Special thanks to "GenoCL" for permission to make this game, based on their famicom cart.

Controls:

  • Shoot: Z
  • Focus mode: X
  • Bomb: C
  • Move: Arrow keys
  • Pause: Esc

Thanks for playing, any feedback go ahead! This is only a 2 stage demo at the moment, I may work on this more in the future, but is unlikely.
